sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SOUTHEND, a hamlet in the parish of Prittlewell, in the hundred of Rochford and county of Essex, fortytwo miles from London. It stands at the mouth of the Thames, opposite to Sheerness ; and from its easy communication with the metropolis, it has of late years been resorted to by considerable numbers for seabathing.
